<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// MI-level Statepoint operands</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Statepoint operands take the form:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &lt;id&gt;, &lt;num patch bytes &gt;, &lt;num call arguments&gt;, &lt;call target&gt;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &#91;call arguments...&#93;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &lt;StackMaps::ConstantOp&gt;, &lt;calling convention&gt;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &lt;StackMaps::ConstantOp&gt;, &lt;statepoint flags&gt;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &lt;StackMaps::ConstantOp&gt;, &lt;num deopt args&gt;, &#91;deopt args...&#93;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &lt;StackMaps::ConstantOp&gt;, &lt;num gc pointer args&gt;, &#91;gc pointer args...&#93;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &lt;StackMaps::ConstantOp&gt;, &lt;num gc allocas&gt;, &#91;gc allocas args...&#93;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &lt;StackMaps::ConstantOp&gt;, &lt;num  entries in gc map&gt;, &#91;base/derived pairs&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   base/derived pairs in gc map are logical indices into &lt;gc pointer args&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   section.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   All gc pointers assigned to VRegs produce new value (in form of MI Def</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   operand) and are tied to it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/statepointopers"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/statepointopers/#a051a976c9ed4271490fdeef74ae90c93">StatepointOpers</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO:: we should change the STATEPOINT representation so that CC and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Flags should be part of meta operands, with args and deopt operands, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// gc operands all prefixed by their length and a type code. This would be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// much more consistent.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These values are absolute offsets into the operands of the statepoint</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123; IDPos, NBytesPos, NCallArgsPos, CallTargetPos, MetaEnd &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These values are relative offsets from the start of the statepoint meta</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// arguments (i.e. the end of the call arguments).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123; CCOffset = 1, FlagsOffset = 3, NumDeoptOperandsOffset = 5 &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
